scripts.dev: tsx src/http/initEnv.ts && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma db seed && tsx watch src/http/server.ts
scripts.start: tsx src/http/initEnv.ts && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma db seed && tsx watch src/http/server.ts
scripts.teste: tsx src/http/teste.ts && npx prisma migrate dev && npx prisma db seed && tsx watch src/http/server.ts
